HELPP kun was talking about how when he slept with his mouth open on the long drives, 1) his throat would get dry, and 2) he tends to drool üò≠
then proceeds to describe in detail how his drool started dripping from his mouth in slow motion onto his shirt and RIGHT BEFORE it fell he'd startle awake and realise his shirt has a wet patch of drool ü§£ü§£ and he'd think "I CAN'T DROOL ‚ÄºÔ∏è I'M AN IDOL ‚ÄºÔ∏è I CAN'T DO THIS ‚ÄºÔ∏è"
